about.story:
‘Te de Tetera’ is a Chilean brand seeking to give you the experience of enjoying tea in personalized and unique pottery. 
We are known for creating custom designs for you, to deliver the best moments for you and your closest companions when it comes to sharing a delicious tea.
‘Te de Tetera’ began in November 2017, looking to balance raising my daughter and working from home. 
We arrived in Santiago from southern Chile, where tea is essential in everyone’s  home, The perfect time for tea is most commonly after a meal and a beautiful custom personalized hand-painted teapot or porcelain makes for a great conversation and can create memories for a lifetime. 
We invite you to get to know us!
